benchmark_details.name: Creation-MMBench
benchmark_details.overview: Creation-MMBench is a multimodal benchmark specifically designed to evaluate the creative capabilities of MLLMs in real-world, image-based tasks, consisting of 765 test cases across 51 detailed tasks with tailored evaluation criteria.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive assessment of multimodal large language models' creative capabilities by evaluating model performance on various real-world creative tasks.

data.source: Constructed dataset including a diverse set of real-world scenarios with images and role-based tasks.
data.annotation: Manually curated tasks with specific roles and instructions to guide the generation of creative outputs.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on instance-level criteria comparing generated responses to reference content.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating creative and contextually appropriate responses.
methodology.validation: Extensive evaluations conducted comparing various MLLMs on the same tasks.
